facts.content: Two packages: cssints (Type-safe CSS utilities + generated functions) and compiler (compile-time transformer regex-based â†’ hash-based class names)
Current generated-functions.ts returns raw CSS strings like "color-mix(...)" but should return CSSProperties objects for compiler integration
flex() takes CSSProperties objects, but API expects css.flex(css.items("center")) pattern where utilities are passed as arguments
Missing cn(), media(), token.*, set.*, createTokens/createGlobalTheme, color helpers (mix, lighten, darken)
Transformer expects CSSProperties objects, not strings, for class name generation

decisions: Unify return types - functions should return typed CSS property objects (CSSProperties), not strings
Add cn function - branded type merger that compiler recognizes for cx pattern
Fix composable pattern - make flex(), grid() accept utility functions as shown in API
Add media wrapper - media() returns wrapper that compounds class names
Transformer should replace function calls with string class names at compile time, types should reflect that
Created simpler Vite plugin for transformation that integrates with cssints module resolution
